p: Our results suggested that the unprecedented dengue outbreak in Guangzhou in 2014 was caused by two serotypes of dengue virus, DENV-1 and DENV-2. A similar outbreak of dengue fever had been reported in other cities than Guangzhou of Guangdong Province and in Japan [ 8]. DENV-2 was isolated in Nansha District only, while DENV-1 was still predominant in Guangzhou.
